sn34.41-45:1.3: samadhismim gocarakusalo hoti, na samadhismim arammanakusalo …
sn34.41-45:1.4: neva samadhismim arammanakusalo hoti, na ca samadhismim gocarakusalo …
sn34.41-45:1.5: samadhismim arammanakusalo ca hoti, samadhismim gocarakusalo ca.
sn34.41-45:1.9: (Purimamulakani viya yava pancacattalisama arammanamulakasappayakarisutta panca suttani puretabbani.)
